description:
Mt. Hakurei`s barrier disappears. Inuyasha is worried about Kagome. Kagome heads to Mt. Hakurei with Koga and the others. Meanwhile, Kikyo and Sesshomaru have sensed that something strange has happened from different locations.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A batalha final!; O último e mais forte dos Shichinintai
Der Entscheidungskampf! Der letzte und stärkste der sieben Krieger!
El más fuerte y el último de los siete guerreros
Final Battle: The Last and Strongest of the Band of Seven
決戦! 最強最後の七人隊
